title: 8 Essential Tips for Designers Crafting Branded Templates in Figma Buzz

paragraphs.content: Figma Buzz empowers designers to create responsive branded templates that maintain consistency across team outputs. Key practices include using auto layout for flexible spacing and separating text layers for bulk creation compatibility. Descriptive naming and component variants further ensure usability while locking brand elements prevents off-brand edits.

sections.title: Mastering Auto Layout and Text Layer Separation

paragraphs.content: Auto layout forms the backbone of responsive templates by adjusting buttons, text boxes, and images to content changes without misalignment. Separating text layers for unique inputs, especially varying fonts, prevents formatting breaks in Bulk Create workflows. Testing with real content validates adaptability across formats.

sections.title: Optimizing Layer Naming and File Organization

paragraphs.content: Descriptive labels such as "Event Title" or "CTA Button Text" clarify editable fields for users. Including formatting examples like "Date of Event (e.g. July 10, 2025)" guides proper inputs. Clear file titles and standardized conventions enhance searchability in team libraries.
